item.description:
Dear German Expatriates,
I wanted to set a brief agenda for the upcoming Meetup. I assume you have heard or read taht Meetup is starting to charge every group/organizer a monthly fee for the services they provide for this.

I would very much like to hear what you think about that. Please come to this month Meetup and I look forward to a lively discussion.

Please RSVP, so I can make arangements for the venue.

You humble organizer
Kaj
item.name: German Expatriates in Boston Meetup April Meetup
